entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:08 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -34.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kugaaruk Airport 6:00 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: -34.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -48
Dewpoint: -37.5°C
Wind: W 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 57 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 6:05 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Blowing snow. High minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 33. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 6:05 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 after midnight. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 56 in the evening and minus 51 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 6:05 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023
